title: Trump’s Middle East Wins | Guests: Amb. Friedman & Robbie George | 8/14/20
description:
President Trump has proved yet again that his Middle East strategy is incredibly effective. Is a major San Andreas Fault earthquake coming soon? U.S. Ambassador to Israel David Friedman joins to discuss why the United Arab Emirates’ normalization of relations with Israel is truly historic and how a Biden administration could reverse Trump’s progress. In a new segment, Glenn reviews all the news that’ll make you say, “No s***, Sherlock!” Glenn’s latest podcast with NFL legend Herschel Walker is truly inspiring and covers way more than football. Princeton professor Robbie George has been contacted by tons of professors who fear coming out as conservative. World-renowned exorcist Rev. Bill Bean believes that “The Exorcist” is accurate.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
